casebody.data:
Timothy Peaceable against Robert Whitehill and John Lousey. Plea of the act of limitations added in trespass for mesne profits. Mr. Ingersoll for the defendant Mr. Hopkins, pro quer.

Trespass for mesne profits, founded on a recovery in ejectment. The suit was removed by certiorari.

obtained a rule to show a cause, why the plea of the act of limitations should not be added to the general issue ; which was afterwards made absolute, on motion.
